text: Tachys is a genus of beetles in the family Carabidae. It contains hundreds of species. Species were first organised into this genus in 1821, by Pierre Fran√ßois Marie Auguste Dejean. ==References== ==More reading== * Darlington, P.J. (1962) Australian Carabid beetles XI. Some Tachys.
